projects.title: P3ABC — Revenue Insights
projects.subtitle: Automated invoices, DSO trends & delivery analysis
projects.description: Replaced manual invoice tracking with an automated ETL + dashboard solution. Key KPIs: Average Order Value, DSO, Return Rate, Cancellation Rate. Identified delivery partner issues and optimized invoice cycle.

projects.title: Crypto Analysis — Momentum & Risk
projects.subtitle: Backtests, risk heatmaps and momentum metrics
projects.description: Exploratory analysis of crypto markets with backtests and risk visualization. Built prototype dashboards to show strategy performance and drawdowns.

projects.title: Electricity Consumption Forecast
projects.subtitle: Time-series forecasting & anomaly detection
projects.description: Built a forecasting pipeline and monitoring dashboard for operations that helps detect anomalies and predict load.
